io.artframework

Interface TriggerRequirement<TTarget,TConfig>

  • Type Parameters:
    TTarget - the type of the target
    TConfig - the type of the config
    All Superinterfaces:
    ResultCreator
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TriggerRequirement<TTarget,TConfig>
extends ResultCreator
    Provides the option to provide a predicate with a config that is checked before the trigger is executed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result test(Target<TTarget> target, ExecutionContext<TriggerContext> context, TConfig config)
      Tests the given trigger and target against the config and returns the result of the check.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.artframework.ResultCreator

        cancelled, empty, error, error, failure, resultOf, resultOf, success

    • Method Detail

      • test

        Result test(Target<TTarget> target,
            ExecutionContext<TriggerContext> context,
            TConfig config)
        Tests the given trigger and target against the config and returns the result of the check.

        Use the ResultCreator.success(String...) and ResultCreator.failure(String...) methods to provide a result.

        Parameters:
        target - the target to check
        context - the context of the check
        config - the config of the check
        Returns:
        the result of the check
